name: Back From The Brink
description:
=== Notes ===

This game is over 300mb, I recommend downloading the windows version otherwise it will take a while to load.

=== Features ===

  • 29 Unique Weapons
    • Special Legendary Variants of Weapons
  • 25 Areas to explore
  • 13 Named Quests
  • Survival Mode
    • More Maps if the game is popular
  • Armory
    • Test out all weapons in the game
  • Meaningful Choices
    • Will you betray your allies or help them?
  • Cannon to the 12-games-1-story challenge

=== Description ===

Ajax Strangleson is at large following the collapse of the Oakton government. As the nation falls into chaos, one man steps out of retirement to bring order to chaos. Can he bring the nation back from the brink or is it already to late?

=== Backstory ===

I have a short standing tradition to take whoever I consider to be my Best Friend that year and make them a custom game. In 2022 it was my friend Justin, this is that game containing some slight modifications and meant to be canonical to my on-going 12-months-1-story project. Hope you enjoy!

=== Controls (Can be Rebound) ===

  • W - Move up
  • A - Move Left
  • S - Move Down
  • D - Move Right
  • F - Interact
  • M - Open Settings
  • i - Open inventory
  • esc - toggle full screen
  • R - reload
  • Swap Weapon = Tab
  • Quick Swap to Weapon 1 - Key 1
  • Quick Swap to Weapon 2 - Key 2
  • Quick Swap to Weapon 3 - Key 3
  • Quick Swap to Weapon 4 - Key 4

=== Project 2021? ===

Back in 2021, I gave myself a challenge, 12 games, 12 months, 1 story. While I successfully finished the challenge, the story still had a ways to go. This game is Cannon to the Project 2021 story. Play the rest of the games here: https://itch.io/c/2063306/12-games-12-months-1-story
